mapper.select: select p.product_id as productId, p.product_model_number as productModelNumber from bison.product p left join bison_amz_product_inventory.user_product_amz_asin_rel rel on p.product_id = rel.product_id left join bison.amz_seller s on rel.seller_id = s.seller_id where s.brand_id = #{brandId} group by p.product_id

select p.product_id as productId, p.product_model_number as productModelNumber
from bison.product p left join bison_amz_product_inventory.user_product_amz_asin_rel rel on p.product_id = rel.product_id left join bison.amz_seller s on rel.seller_id = s.seller_id where rel.country_id = #{countryId} and s.brand_id = #{brandId} group by p.product_id
